title: Compiler should refuse to compile interface embed in struct
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

1.6.2

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

```
GOARCH="amd64"
GOOS="darwin"
```

but this bug is on all CPU/OS

3. What did you do?

https://play.golang.org/p/OCQAds5FdQ

4. What did you expect to see?

Compiler should refuse to compile the struct called `bug` as it embed an interface and not an other struct.

5. What did you see instead?

panic at runtime
